snippet.title: TPC Sawgrass: Roberto Castro takes PGA event by storm

Norman opened with a 63 in 1994 when he went on to shatter the tournament... And he's in the record book at The Players Championship. Sawgrass is rarely in short supply of surprises.

snippet.title: Browns locker room gets forced renovation
snippet.description:
Wednesday July 25, 2007 10:37 pm
... gallons of water and some sewage flooded the eight-year-old structure recently. Old pipes in Cleveland's water system are largely to blame, city and stadium officials said Wednesday. Iron deposits flaked... 8-inch water pipe located under the team shop -- the main supply of water to the 72,000-seat stadium --
